long_description: The Park work tray is a great work stand accessory built to keep tools, lubes and spare parts close at hand. Installs easily utilizing the exclusive receiver pod accessory system found on the Park Home Mechanic (PCS-10) repair stand, sold separately. Universal, large compartment and separate small compartment. Lube holder. Integrated tab system holds plastic trash bag. 2 receiver pods accept accessories. Universal tool/towel bar. Work tray also fits Park PRS-25, PRS-15 and PCS-11 repair stands.
short_description: The Park work tray is a great work stand accessory built to keep tools, lubes and spare parts close at hand.
